reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it's forgiving for various body shapes, and appreciate its classic style and quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic style
items.body: This dress is beautiful. Perfect for a Christmas party! Fit true to size. I am 5'4" and 128lbs. Stretch, quality velvet. Read more
items.author: Angela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and good quality
items.body: Very comfortable and close if not 100% true yo size. Perfect length for the wedding I wore it to as well. Fabric is slightly heavier than expected which was perfect. Read more
items.author: Chey Storm

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect party dress
items.body: Really pretty and flattering! I love the deep purple color. I ordered the recommended size, and it's just too loose through the shoulders and bust. I've ordered the next size smaller, which is my usual size. This is for a holiday party, and will be perfect once I have the right size. The velvet is stretchy, and should be worn snug for the best fit. It covers well, the fabric is good quality. Usually, velvet or velour is sewn with the nap going down the garment, but this is sewn with the nap going up. The waist piece is cut with the nap going side to side, which isn't typical. The style of the dress is flattering and tucks in at my waist. The length is perfect for me, but might be too short on a tall person. Read more
items.author: Craftsalatte

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s very comfortable it’s very pretty and it fits very well
items.body: This is an absolutely gorgeous dress Read more
items.author: Brenda Sepanski

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Nursing Friendly
items.body: I’ll start with the positive. The fabric was lovely, rich, heavy velvet, and I loved the color and feel of it. The length and fit were also both as expected for a size medium. However, the lining of the bodice made for an odd line along the bust. Additionally, I had expected top to be a true crossover and so foldable for nursing/breastfeeding, but it was not. It is all one piece and not stretchy along the neckline. This breastfeeding piece was key for me, but, even if not, I would not have kept the dress due to the odd line created by the lining in the bust. Read more
items.author: Kyndra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the dress, fit is big though
items.body: I'm right between a small and medium. I ordered a small which are usually tight on me, but it was a bit loose. It was a really nice dress and looked great though! Just order a size down. Read more
items.author: Elanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful velvet cocktail/party/formal dress
items.body: Not sure why they call this a vintage look because I don’t really see “vintage” in the look of the dress. It fit amazing for a plus size woman, had stretch, was a great length and the sleeves hit and fit just right. It is so hard to find a dress for plus size that isn’t sleeveless, has a slit to show everything, is too short, shows every roll, etc and this dress hit all the boxes I was looking for. The teal/peacock color was stunning. I bought to wear to stand in a wedding, however, my son thought the look was too formal compared to what the 69 year old bride was wearing. I ended up returning and bought something more simple. However, I did absolutely love this dress and would have kept but knew that I would not be going anywhere that I would be able to wear it, especially since I live in Florida. You will not be disappointed if you buy this dress. Read more
items.author: Sherry Garcia

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Previously worn item received, boo
items.body: Received a returned item. Covered in lint and animal hair. The dress itself is ok. The color is beautiful. The cut is flattering for my mom bod. This particular item looks to have been repacked with zipper undone. It's as if someone did a mass purchase of try and returns, but they let their animal roll around all over it. Someone made a bad call thinking this article could be sold as new. If you don't want to wear a dirty, returned item, give yourself time to buy ahead as an event clothing purchase. You might need to to find a replacement. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: V2-black, V2-navy, Velvet-black, Velvet-burgundy, Velvet-grape, Velvet-navy, Velvet-dark Green, Velvet-dark Red, V2-dark Green, V2-turquoise, V2-burgundy, Velvet-turquoise. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
